project.name: RPG cyberGABURA
project.notes: RPG game made as a game programming challenge without image files. The proposal is inspired by pokemon battles with a retro cyberpunk style.

scene.name: RPG cyberGABURA
scene.notes: RPG game made as a game programming challenge without image files. The proposal is inspired by pokemon battles with a retro cyberpunk style.

block-definition.comment: This block allows you to set the pen's color, transparency (on a scale from 0=opaque to 100=invisible), or size (in pixels). The color can be set in many ways, including RGB values, HSV values, HSL values, fair HSV or HSL (based on a modified spectrum that gives each spectral color equal space and promotes brown to a color), color number, crayon, or X11/W3C color name. See Appendix A in the Snap! Reference Manual for details.
block-definition.translations: ca:$brush fixa el _ del llapis a _ _

input.options: color color number crayon fair hue ~1 size transparency X11/W3C name ~2 (3D color spaces)={ fair HSL={ fair hue fair saturation (HSL) fair lightness fair HSL vector } fair HSV={ fair hue fair saturation (HSV) fair value (brightness) fair HSV vector } HSL={ hue saturation (HSL) lightness HSL vector } HSV={ hue saturation (HSV) value (brightness) HSV vector } RGB (0-255)={ red green blue RGB(A) vector RGB(A) hex } }

scripts.comment: Note to myself: When the user sets a fair dimension, say fair HSL, variable HSL contains the corresponding "unfair" values, and "raw HSL" contains the numbers the user actually gave. It has to be this way because in the case of HSV, there is no "HSV" variable; rather, we use the pen's actual remembered-by-Javascript color's HSV coordinates. So our HSL variable has to be analogous to that. In both cases "raw" means the numbers the user gave us.

custom-block.s: set pen color to h: %n s: %n v: %n

block-definition.comment: The identity function reports its input.

This block reports the pen size, color, or transparency, in all the same ways that the SET PEN block allows you to set those pen properties. (It will also report the current crayon number, if the pen color was most recently set with SET PEN TO CRAYON.) See Appendix A of the Snap! Reference Manual for details.

input.options: color color number crayon fair hue ~1 size transparency X11/W3C name ~2 (3D color spaces)={ fair HSL={ fair hue fair saturation (HSL) fair lightness fair HSL vector } fair HSV={ fair hue fair saturation (HSV) fair value (brightness) fair HSV vector } HSL={ hue saturation (HSL) lightness HSL vector } HSV={ hue saturation (HSV) value (brightness) HSV vector } RGB (0-255)={ red green blue RGB vector RGBA vector RGB(A) hex } }

block-definition.comment: Changes any pen property by the specified amount. Some color scales can't be adjusted this way unless the color was first SET using that scale. Vectors (e.g., RGB color as a list of three numbers) can be incremented by a vector as the amount. X11/W3C names can't be incremented.

input.options: color number crayon fair hue ~1 size transparency ~2 (3D color spaces)={ fair HSL={ fair hue fair saturation (HSL) fair lightness fair HSL vector } fair HSV={ fair hue fair saturation (HSV) fair value (brightness) fair HSV vector } HSL={ hue saturation (HSL) lightness HSL vector } HSV={ hue saturation (HSV) value (brightness) HSV vector } RGB (0-255)={ red green blue RGB vector RGBA vector } }

custom-block.l: Sorry, I don't know how to add in hexadecimal.

list.l: I don't know how to handle

custom-block.s: set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n

block-definition.comment: combines any number of colors, reporting the result of mixing them, either additively (like colored light beams) or subtractively (like paints). If the result is too bright (additive) or too dark (subtractive), try the "averaged" versions, which will make the brightness more like the brightnesses of the input colors.

input.options: additive (light) additive (averaged) subtractive (ideal) subtractive (averaged) simulated paint paint (sRGB corrected)

block-definition.comment: This block reports a color. The color can be set in many ways, including RGB values, HSV values, HSL values, fair HSV or HSL (based on a modified spectrum that gives each spectral color equal space and promotes brown to a color), color number, crayon, or X11/W3C color name. See Appendix A in the Snap! Reference Manual for details.

input.options: color color number crayon fair hue X11/W3C name ~ fair HSL=fair HSL vector fair HSV=fair HSV vector HSL=HSL vector HSV=HSV vector RGB (0-255)=RGB vector RGB hex

nearest color number crayon number fair hue ~1 transparency X11/W3C name ~2 (3D color spaces)={ fair HSL={ fair hue fair saturation (HSL) fair lightness fair HSL vector } fair HSV={ fair hue fair saturation (HSV) fair value (brightness) fair HSV vector } HSL={ hue saturation (HSL) lightness HSL vector } HSV={ hue saturation (HSV) value (brightness) HSV vector } RGB (0-255)={ red green blue RGB vector RGBA vector RGB hex } }

custom-block.l: Can't get here -- please post project and screenshot to forum.

block-definition.comment: This block reports the pen color (as a color, not as a list of numbers).

Sets the pen color to one of 100 preselected colors, like a box of 100 crayons. The colors have names that are meant to be evocative. They are organized in families, more or less corresponding to spectral (rainbow) colors; the input slot has a two-level menu in which you can hover over a family name to see the colors of that family, each including a crayon number and an RGB value. See Appendix A of the Snap! Reference Manual for more details.
block-definition.translations: ca:✐ fixa el llapis de color _ _

custom-block.s: set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n

block-definition.s: set pen color to r: %'r' g: %'g' b: %'b'
block-definition.comment: Takes three inputs for red, green, and blue values, each between 0 and 255. 0,0,0 is black; 255,255,255 is white. 255,255,0 is yellow, and so on. The SET PEN block in this library lets you set individual red, green, or blue without changing the others, lets you provide a list of three RGB color components, and lets you provide a six-digit hexadecimal number, the form in which RGB color values are usually found online. See Appendix A of the Snap! Reference Manual for details.
block-definition.translations: pt:altera a cor da tua caneta para vermelho _ , verde _ e azul _ (0 a 255) ca:fixa el llapis al color r: _ g: _ b: _

block-definition.s: set pen color to h: %'h' s: %'s' v: %'v'
block-definition.comment: Takes three inputs for hue, saturation, and value ("brightness") values, each between 0 and 1. 0,0,0 is black; 0,0,1 is white. 0.15,1,1 is yellow, and so on. The SET PEN block in this library lets you set individual hue, saturation, or value without changing the others, lets you provide a list of three HSV color components, and lets you use the very much superior HSL (hue, saturation, lightness) color space. See Appendix A of the Snap! Reference Manual for details.
block-definition.translations: pt:altera a cor da caneta para matiz _ , saturação _ e brilho _ (0 a 1) ca:fixa el llapis al color h: _ s: _ v: _

block-definition.comment: Reports the current pen color as a list of three RGB values in the range 0-255. The PEN block in this library provides a large set of ways to examine the color. See Appendix A in the Snap! Reference Manual for details.
block-definition.translations: pt:a cor da caneta em RGB (vermelho, verde e azul; 0 a 255)

block-definition.comment: Reports the current pen color as a list of three HSV values in the range 0-1. See Appendix A in the Snap! Reference Manual for details.
block-definition.translations: pt:a cor da caneta em HSV (matiz, saturação e brilho, 0 a 1)

block-definition.comment: Takes a value from 0 to 15 and reports the corresponding hexadecimal digit. For internal use of the color library.
Don't ask. Only for internal use by the SET PEN block.
Creates a bunch of global variables. For internal use by Color library.

✐ color number in %n family, from H: %n S: %n L: %n %br rising hue: %n %br rising min lightness: %n falling min lightness: %n

block-definition.comment: hue mod 100, other components cut off at [0, 100]

block.comment: We have to do this last test to rule out the vector options, which aren't numbers; their code makes three recursive calls and we catch range issues then.

set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n
set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n

set pen color to h: %n s: %n v: %n

block-definition.s: ✐ set pen to fair HSL vector %'value' %'more'
✐ set pen to fair HSV vector %'value' %'more'

block-definition.comment: Reports the part of the first string up to the first instance of the second string inside it. If the second string isn't found, reports the entire first string.

custom-block.s: substring of %txt from position %n to position %n inclusive

block-definition.comment: Reports the portion of the first input string starting after the first occurrence of the second string. If the second string isn't found in the first string, reports an empty string.

custom-block.s: substring of %txt from position %n to position %n inclusive

block-definition.comment: Reports the character position (starting from 1) of the beginning of the first input string inside the second input string. If it's not found, reports 0.
If input is TRUE, comparisons made by functions in the string library will be case-independent (so "FOO" = "foo"). This is the default. If input is FALSE, comparisons will be exact.
block-definition.translations: pt:altera comparações ignorando distinção minúsculas/maiúsculas para _

block-definition.s: substring of %'str' from position %'start' to position %'end' inclusive
block-definition.comment: Reports the portion of the first input (string) starting at the position given by the second input (counting from 1, like LETTER n OF) and ending at the position given by the third input (also counting from 1). If the third input is empty, reports the portion from the first position to the end of the string. If a position number is negative, counts from the end backward, so -1 is the last character, -2 is the next to last, etc.
block-definition.translations: pt:o texto de _ entre as posições _ e _ , inclusive

block-definition.comment: Reports True if the first input string contains the second input string, otherwise false. Comparison is case-independent by default; use USE CASE-INDEPENDENT COMPARISONS to change that.
Reports the input text with lower case letters instead of capital letters in the input. Uses the user's locale's rules for case conversion.

This block creates new variables on the selected scope: global (for all sprites), sprite (for this sprite only) or script (only for that blocks stack) with the names given (in 'names' list). If there is already a variable with that name in that scope, it does nothing: no errors and no overwrites.
block-definition.translations: pt:cria as variáveis _ _ ca:crea les _ variables _ es:crear las _ variables _ de:erstellen _ var _

block-definition.comment: This block reports "true" if there is a variable with this given name (input slot) in that context. It can be a global, sprite or script variable. Otherwise it reports "false".
block-definition.translations: pt:a variável _ existe ca:existeix la variable _ ? es:existe la variable _ ? de:existiert var _ ?

block-definition.s: ATUALIZAR %'bloco_desenho' $nl exe s/ save: %'bloco_sem_save' $nl s/ exe e save: %'bloco_escondido'

custom-block.l: das maré do ciberespaço surge... o slime digital nocivo.
from the tides of cyberspace emerges... the harmful digital slime.
tentáculos holograficos apresentam a criatura uma bolha de bits papoca de energia.
holographic tentacles present the creature a bubble of energy-filled bits.
O veneno se intensifica na batalha.
Os tentaculos afiados espreitam o oponente.
o corpo de jelly molenga e murcho.
the limp and withered jelly body.
Dados se organizam formando um aracnídeo.
Data is organized to form an arachnid.
Partículas espinhosas se propagam ao se juntar forma um grande insectóide.
Spiny particles spread when they come together to form a large insectoid.
através de teias de plasma surge Bugware.
A calda de escorpião revela sua ponta afiada.
The scorpion's tail reveals its sharp tip.
As patas do aracnídeo ficam cada vez maior.
The arachnid's legs get bigger and bigger.
The creature shrinks until it disappears.
faces retangulares se juntam formando caixas um imensa criatura quadridimensional surge.
rectangular faces come together to form boxes, an immense four-dimensional creature appears.
Os cubos que formam moro ficam agitados.
The cubes that form moro become agitated.
Uma névoa de bits cobre a criatura.
A mist of bits covers the creature.
Os cubos se desmontam revelando várias caixas vazias
The cubes disassemble revealing several empty boxes
As faces que formam moro ficam sem cor.
The faces that form Moro become colorless.
Imensas torres de bits aglomerados surge.
Huge towers of agglomerated bits appear.
Estacas cibernéticas formam um grandes pilares.
O firewall executa uma auto limpeza.
dados corrompidos são descartados pelo firewall
corrupted data is discarded by the firewall
A imensa defesa do firewall continua inabalada.
The firewall's immense defense remains unshaken.
As grandes torres racham como se fossem vidro Os pedaços de bits se esparramam.
The great towers crack as if they were glass The bits scatter.
As defesas do firewall foram destruídas o grande prédio desmorona.
The firewall defenses have been destroyed the great building collapses.
Os escudos perdem a opacidade até desaparecer.
Shields lose opacity until they disappear.
Um grande cubo flutuante se aproxima.
Blocker o cubo gigante surge com teletransporte virtual
Blocker the giant cube appears with virtual teleportation
Um redemoinha de bits revelam Blocker.
A swirl of bits reveal Blocker.
As defesa de blocker está ativada.
Partículas formam uma poluição ao redor da criatura.
Particles form a smog around the creature.
Blocker é desmontado peça por peça.
Blocker is disassembled piece by piece.
O bloco se quebra e milhares de pedaços.
The block breaks into thousands of pieces.
Energia da criatura se dissipa fazendo ele desaparecer.
The creature's energy dissipates, causing it to disappear.
Luzes radiantes formam uma criatura imensa.
Radiant lights form an immense creature.
Energia das profundezas do cyberspaço surgem se aglomerando numa grande estrutura de cristal.
Energy from the depths of cyberspace emerges, gathering into a large crystal structure.
Uma constelação de bits brilha muito forte se transforma numa criatura radiante.
A constellation of bits shines very brightly and transforms into a radiant creature.
A energia de Orion está a 100%.
O brilho do porder de orion emana por todas as peças da criatura.
The glow of Orion's power emanates from every piece of the creature.
Orion absorve energia do medo de seu inimigo.
Orion absorbs energy from his enemy's fear.
As luzes se apagam e Orion desaparece.
The lights go out and Orion disappears.
As constelações de orion se separam, fazendo a criatura implodir.
The Orion constellations separate, causing the creature to implode.
as peças da criatura se desmontam, a criatura fica aos pedaços.
the creature's parts fall apart, the creature is left in pieces.
Milhares de fios virtuais formam um verme.
Thousands of virtual threads form a worm.
Das profundezas do ciberespaço surge um imenso verme sedento por batalha.
From the depths of cyberspace emerges an immense worm thirsting for battle.
Um padrão de estacas afiadas se movem juntos formando uma grande minhoca.
A pattern of sharp spikes move together forming a large worm.
Estacas do Worm ficam cada vez mais afiadas.
Worm's stakes get sharper and sharper.
A criatura aumenta seu tamanho ficando 2 vezes maior.
The creature increases its size, becoming twice as large.
O verme aquece ao ponto de brilhar de tão quente.
The worm heats up to the point where it glows with heat.
O worm se transfoma em slime de bits.
The worm turns into bit slime.
A criatura é desaparece ficando transparente até desaparecer por completo.
The creature disappears, becoming transparent until it disappears completely.
Partículas voando como insetos se aglomeram virando uma criatura insectóide.
Particles flying like insects gather together turning into an insect-like creature.
Um buraco negro surge e através dele aparece Spymine.
A black hole appears and through it appears Spymine.
As patas da criatura fazem faiscas ao colidir uma com a outra.
The creature's paws spark as they collide with each other.
O olho intenso de spymine brilha ao encarar o inimigo.
Spymine's intense eye glows as it stares at the enemy.
Garras de spymine liberam lasers cortantes.
A criatura é despedaçada e seus restos são sugados por um buraco negro.
The creature is torn apart and its remains are sucked into a black hole.
A criatura explode e milhares de pedaços.
The creature explodes into thousands of pieces.
Uma supernova no ciberespaço ilumina a entrada da criatura radiante Boros.
A supernova in cyberspace illuminates the entrance to the radiant creature Boros.
Hologramas divinos se concentram formando a criatura.
Divine holograms concentrate to form the creature.
Boros aumenta seu tamanho e imponência.
Boros increases its size and grandeur.
Energia de boros forma uma camada protetora divina.
Boros energy forms a divine protective layer.
Boros se movimenta rápido levitando pelo campo.
Boros moves quickly, levitating across the field.
A criatura divina fica escurecida e imóvel.
The divine creature becomes darkened and motionless.
Energia de boros se dilui até ele sumir.
Boros energy dilutes until it disappears.
Uma lacraia repleta de glitchs surge.
Um grande inseto com centenas de patas aparece através de uma escavação do chão.
A large insect with hundreds of legs appears through a burrow in the ground.
O inseto gigante vem rolando e fica em posição de ataque.
The giant insect comes rolling and gets into attack position.
A lacraia virtual cospe um veneno quente como lava.
The virtual centipede spits out a venom as hot as lava.
A criatura mostra suas garras afiadas e compridas.
The creature shows its long, sharp claws.
Crocker ativa laser de seus 6 olhos.
Crocker activates laser from his 6 eyes.
O inseto se divide em 100 pedaços.
Tentáculos do submundo do ciberespaço puxam o corpo caido de Crocker para fora da arena.
Tentacles from the cyberspace underworld pull Crocker's prone body out of the arena.

input.options: Jelly Bugware Moro Firewall Blocker Orion Worm Spymine Boros Crocker
per seg inv vul desenho textos={ entrada batalha derrota } raridade

custom-block.l: Um ataque hacker onde os atributos de invasão do jogador entra em embate com o atributo de segurança do oponente.
A hacker attack where the player's hacking attributes clash with the opponent's security attribute.

Quando o atributo de integridade do inimigo está baixo, o jogador pode absorver o programa inimigo. É possível também absorver o oponente quando o programa inimigo tem todas suas vulnerabilidades expostas por comandos do deck.

When the enemy's integrity attribute is low, the player can absorb the enemy program. It is also possible to absorb the opponent when the enemy program has all of its vulnerabilities exposed by deck commands.
Ao usar se os atributos de performance e invasão do jogador forem superior ao ao atibuto de segurança é possível descobrir as vulnerabilidades do oponente.
By using the player's performance and invasion attributes to be superior to the security attribute, it is possible to discover the opponent's vulnerabilities.
Injeta uma cyber agulha no programa. -15 de integridade do oponente.
Injects a cyber needle into the program. -15 opponent's integrity.
compila um espaço subterrâneo. +25 de invasão do jogador. -5 de performance do jogador. -10 de integridade do jogador.
compiles an underground space. +25 player invasion. -5 player performance. -10 player integrity.
Ativa alta aceleração da máquina virtual. +25 de performance do jogador. -20 de integridade do jogador.
Enables high acceleration of the virtual machine. +25 player performance. -20 player integrity.
Aumenta as defesas compilando grandes profundezas. +25 de segurança do jogador. -10 de invasão do jogador.
Increases defenses by compiling large depths. +25 player security. -10 player invasion.
Propaga os núcleos da máquina virtual. +15 de performance do jogador.
Spreads virtual machine cores. +15 player performance.
Gera uma nuvem de arquivos corrompidos na batalha. -25 de integridade do oponente. -10 de invasão do jogador.
Generates a cloud of corrupted files in battle. -25 opponent integrity. -10 player invasion.
Um algoritmo para encontrar brechas de segurança. -15 de segurança do oponente.
An algorithm for finding security holes. -15 opponent security.
JGHJK / DF \ | NMB | | XZ | | LOP | \ QRST/
Reinicia a máquina virtual. +25 de integridade do jogador. -5 de performance do jogador.
Restarts the virtual machine. +25 player health. -5 player performance.
Ativa plugin de espionagem. -15 de segurança do oponente.
Compila uma camada protetora criptografada. +15 de segurança do jogador.
Compiles an encrypted protective layer. +15 player security.
Gera mina de blocos sobre o campo de batalha. -15 de invasão do oponente.
Generates a block mine over the battlefield. -15 opponent invasion.
Ataque invasivo de força bruta. -25 de integridade do oponente +10 de segurança do oponente.
Brute force invasive attack. -25 opponent integrity +10 opponent security.
Compila uma máscara protetora. +10 de segurança do jogador. -5 de performance do jogador. -10 de invasão do oponente.
Compiles a protective mask. +10 player safety. -5 player performance. -10 opponent invasion.
Algoritmo que coleta dados do campo de batalha. +25 de invasão do jogador. -10 de segurança do jogador.
Algorithm that collects data from the battlefield. +25 player invasion. -10 player security.
Ataque com escavação que afeta toda a arena. -25 de integridade do oponente. -15 de integridade do jogador.
Dig attack that affects the entire arena. -25 opponent health. -15 player health.

input.options: Hack Scan Absorb Run Injection Dig Over -c Deep -ur Spread Glitch Keymath Reboot Eco spy Bubble Mine -a Force -b Mask -t Cat -u Scrap

custom-block.l: Nesse jogo você precisa vasculhar o ciberespaço batalhando com programas maliciosos. Você precisa capturar 10 programas para finalizar a jornada. O comando "Hunt" faz uma busca na rede até achar um programa oponente. Durante a batalha você precisa enfraquecer o programa oponente com ataques hackers. Ao diminuir a integridade do programa oponente é possível absorver e capturar. Durante o combate você pode utilizar comandos especiais com seu cyberdeck. Comandos executam habilidades que podem fortalecer seu programa ou enfraquecer o oponente. Cada programa tem vulnerabilidades específicas, ao utilizar ações do deck com a vulnerabilidade do oponente você pode deixar ele "vulnerável". Quando o oponente estiver vulnerável ele pode ser absorvido sem dificuldades. Alguns programas são muito poderosos, você pode trocar o programa em uso com o comando "Software". Nesta tela mostra seus programas capturados.

In this game, you have to scour the cyberspace and battle malicious programs. You have to capture 10 programs to complete the journey. The "Hunt" command searches the network until you find an opposing program. During the battle, you have to weaken the opposing program with hacker attacks. By decreasing the integrity of the opposing program, you can absorb and capture it. During combat, you can use special commands with your cyberdeck. Commands execute abilities that can strengthen your program or weaken the opponent. Each program has specific vulnerabilities. By using actions from the deck with the opponent's vulnerability, you can make it "vulnerable". When the opponent is vulnerable, it can be absorbed without difficulty. Some programs are very powerful. You can change the program in use with the "Software" command. This screen shows your captured programs.
Jogo criado por "Gabura" em Dezembro de 2024. Feito com carinho como um desafio de programação criando RPG sem arquivos de imagem.
Game created by "Gabura" in December 2024. Made with love as a programming challenge creating RPG without image files.

custom-block.s: ATUALIZAR %cmdRing %br exe s/ save: %cmdRing %br s/ exe e save: %cmdRing

custom-block.l: Olá usuário. Você está começando uma jornada dentro do computador. Seja bem vindo ao CYBER ESPAÇO!
Hello user. You are starting a journey inside the computer. Welcome to CYBER SPACE!

item.list: The cyber jellyfish appears.,from the tides of cyberspace emerges... the harmful digital slime.,"holographic tentacles present the creature a bubble of energy-filled bits."
The poison intensifies in battle.,Sharp tentacles stalk the opponent.,Jelly becomes a little translucent.
Jelly is chatty.,the limp and withered jelly body.,Jelly gets melted
Data is organized to form an arachnid.,Spiny particles spread when they come together to form a large insectoid.,through plasma webs Bugware emerges.
The scorpion's tail reveals its sharp tip.,Bugware glows with excitement.,The arachnid's legs get bigger and bigger.
Bugware is crushed.,Bugware DISAPPEARS.,The creature shrinks until it disappears.
Blocks of data cluster together.,3 3D cyberspace cubes form the creature.,"rectangular faces come together to form boxes, an immense four-dimensional creature appears."
The cubes that form moro become agitated.,A mist of bits covers the creature.,The cubes become multicolored.
Moro is shattered.,The cubes disassemble revealing several empty boxes,The faces that form Moro become colorless.
Huge towers of agglomerated bits appear.,Large shields form a barrier.,Cyber ​​stakes form large pillars.
The firewall performs a self-cleaning.,corrupted data is discarded by the firewall,The firewall's immense defense remains unshaken.
"The great towers crack as if they were glass The bits scatter.","The firewall defenses have been destroyed the great building collapses.",Shields lose opacity until they disappear.
A large floating cube approaches.,Blocker the giant cube appears with virtual teleportation,A swirl of bits reveal Blocker.
Blocker defense is activated.,Blocker charges energy for combat.,Particles form a smog around the creature.
Blocker is disassembled piece by piece.,The block breaks into thousands of pieces.,"The creature's energy dissipates, causing it to disappear."

Radiant lights form an immense creature.,"Energy from the depths of cyberspace emerges, gathering into a large crystal structure.","A constellation of bits shines very brightly and transforms into a radiant creature."
Orion's energy is at 100%.,The glow of Orion's power emanates from every piece of the creature.,Orion absorbs energy from his enemy's fear.
The lights go out and Orion disappears.,"The Orion constellations separate, causing the creature to implode.","the creature's parts fall apart, the creature is left in pieces."
Thousands of virtual threads form a worm.,"From the depths of cyberspace emerges an immense worm thirsting for battle.","A pattern of sharp spikes move together forming a large worm."
Worm's stakes get sharper and sharper.,"The creature increases its size, becoming twice as large.",The worm heats up to the point where it glows with heat.
The worm is crushed.,The worm turns into bit slime.,"The creature disappears, becoming transparent until it disappears completely."
"Particles flying like insects gather together turning into an insect-like creature.",A black hole appears and through it appears Spymine.,Dark energy forms the creature.
The creature's paws spark as they collide with each other.,Spymine's intense eye glows as it stares at the enemy.,Spymine claws release cutting lasers.
Spymine is obliterated.,The creature is torn apart and its remains are sucked into a black hole.,The creature explodes into thousands of pieces.
God Boros appears.,A supernova in cyberspace illuminates the entrance to the radiant creature Boros.,Divine holograms concentrate to form the creature.
Boros increases its size and grandeur.,Boros energy forms a divine protective layer.,"Boros moves quickly, levitating across the field."
Boros disappears.,The divine creature becomes darkened and motionless.,Boros energy dilutes until it disappears.
A glitchy centipede appears.,A large insect with hundreds of legs appears through a burrow in the ground.,The giant insect comes rolling and gets into attack position.
The virtual centipede spits out a venom as hot as lava.,"The creature shows its long, sharp claws.",Crocker activates laser from his 6 eyes.
The insect divided into 100 pieces.,The creature lies unconscious.,"Tentacles from the cyberspace underworld pull Crocker's prone body out of the arena."
A hacker attack where the player's hacking attributes clash with the opponent's security attribute.

"When the enemy's integrity attribute is low, the player can absorb the enemy program. It is also possible to absorb the opponent when the enemy program has all of its vulnerabilities exposed by deck commands."
"By using the player's performance and invasion attributes to be superior to the security attribute, it is possible to discover the opponent's vulnerabilities."
"Injects a cyber needle into the program. -15 opponent's integrity."
"compiles an underground space. +25 player invasion. -5 player performance. -10 player integrity."
"Enables high acceleration of the virtual machine. +25 player performance. -20 player integrity."
"Increases defenses by compiling large depths. +25 player security. -10 player invasion."
"Generates a cloud of corrupted files in battle. -25 opponent integrity. -10 player invasion."
"An algorithm for finding security holes. -15 opponent security."
" JGHJK / DF \ | NMB | | XZ | | LOP | \ QRST/ "
"Restarts the virtual machine. +25 player health. -5 player performance."
"Compiles an encrypted protective layer. +15 player security."
"Generates a block mine over the battlefield. -15 opponent invasion."
"Brute force invasive attack. -25 opponent integrity +10 opponent security."
"Compiles a protective mask. +10 player safety. -5 player performance. -10 opponent invasion."
"Algorithm that collects data from the battlefield. +25 player invasion. -10 player security."
"Dig attack that affects the entire arena. -25 opponent health. -15 player health."

variable.name: result_confronto
variable.l: The player managed to outwit the enemy program.
